title: B Block Trilogy
description:
3 x 90 Mins

The B Block Trilogy, written by the reliable Wally K Daly, are three linked comic dramas featuring the inmates of B Block at an imaginary prison, and their friends Charles and George from the Prisoners' Aid Society. Who better to commit crimes than guests of Her Majesty?

01 Burglars Bargains - Realising that their pensions from the Prisoners' Aid Society will be very small, Charles and George recruit the B Block prisoners to raid Harridges department store. Unknown to them however, Harridges security is run by the Mafia, who have their own plans.

02 A Right Royal Rip Off - The B Block team plan to steal the Crown Jewels - on the same night as the Mafia plan just the same.

03 The Bigger They Are - The trio finally decide to face up to the Mafia.

All very silly, but entertaining.
